nodes.text: Skorrupon was a terrestrial astronomical object where the New Republic pilots Wyl Lark and Kamala encountered a Twi'lek. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Kamala, in a game of "Who? What? Where?" chose the Twi'lek on Skorrupon to be the first to hear in the event of her death.

Skorrupon was first mentioned in Alphabet Squadron, a novel written by Alexander Freed and published in 2019. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Skorrupon first appeared in Doom Mission, a comic strip written by Archie Goodwin, illustrated by Al Williamson, and released in 1983.
